# Prerequisites

Elementary probability theory and linear algebra will be sufficient.
However, topics regarding theoretical genetics requires knowledge about stochastic processes and measure theory.

Reference on advanced mathematics can be found in @walterrudin1986, @rickdurrett2019 and @rickdurrett2008.
